source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, high-angle shot looking down a city street. The street is framed on both sides by tall, modern skyscrapers and residential buildings. The scene is captured during golden hour, with sunlight illuminating the sides of the buildings and casting long shadows.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a level-angle shot looking down a city street. The street is framed on both sides by tall, modern skyscrapers and residential buildings. The scene is captured during golden hour, with sunlight illuminating the sides of the buildings and casting long shadows.

generated_critique: The caption fails to describe the primary motion in the video. It omits any mention of the large, golden 3D text "EXTREME VENGEANCE" that materializes over the cityscape and then fades away. The description should focus on this action, as it is the most salient event. Additionally, the caption incorrectly describes the shot as "level-angle" when it is a high-angle shot. The current text only describes the static scenery, which violates the instruction to focus on the subject's motion.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: From a high-angle perspective looking down a city street flanked by skyscrapers at golden hour, the words "EXTREME VENGEANCE" materialize in large, golden 3D letters. The title hovers centrally over the cityscape before fading out of view.
